sections.code: /*background color*/body{background-color:#C7EDCC !important;}/*text font size*/DIV.noveltext{font-size:14px !important;}DIV[style="float:left;width:480px;padding-left:70px;font-size:16px;"]{padding:15px 0px 30px !important;font-size:20px !important;width:100% !important;font-weight:bold !important;}DIV[style="float:left;width:330px;"]{width:600px !important;}/*Hide advertising,report pictures,footers,etc*/IFRAME,DIV.tc,DIV#uptown,DIV.zero,TABLE[width="984"][bgcolor="#ffffff"],#adp_jjwxc_onebook_300_250,#adp_jjwxc_onebook_EBD_720_40,#adp_h_jjwxc_onebook_yc_180_320,#adp_jjwxc_onebook_print_720_40,#adp_jjwxc_onebook_250_90,DIV[style="float:left;width:160px;height:70px;"],DIV.adp_hidden,IMG[src="http://static.jjwxc.net/images/bo.gif"],/*Report picture*/DIV#footer,/*footer*/DIV.noveltext>FONT[color] /*Hidden interference code,replication still has*/{display:none !important}/*Internal and external margin adjustment*/DIV.controlbar{margin-top:20px !important;padding:1px 1px 5px 9px !important;}#publishcomment{margin-top:20px !important;}TABLE.cytable{margin-top:15px !important;}DIV.readsmall{margin-top:70px !important;} /*Other*/TEXTAREA#commentbody{width:100% !important;}DIV.noveltext>FONT[color="red"]{display:inline !important;}/*VIP page picture adjustment*/DIV.noveltext>IMG[align="bottom"]{width:20px;height:20px;}
